name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: The latest iPhone with A17 Pro chip, Titanium design, and advanced camera system. Features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, 48MP main camera, and all-day battery life.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Flagship Android phone with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 200MP camera, and S Pen support. Features a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with 120Hz refresh rate.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: AI-powered smartphone with Tensor G3 chip, exceptional camera capabilities, and pure Android experience. Features a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display.

name: OnePlus 12
description: Flagship killer with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 50W wireless charging, and Hasselblad camera system. Features a 6.82-inch LTPO AMOLED display with 120Hz.

name: Xiaomi 14 Pro
description: Premium Android device with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, Leica camera partnership, and hypercharge technology. Features a 6.73-inch LTPO AMOLED curved display.

name: Sony Xperia 1 V
description: Professional-grade smartphone with 4K OLED display, Alpha camera technology, and headphone jack. Perfect for content creators and photographers.

name: Nothing Phone (2)
description: Unique transparent design with Glyph interface, Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1, and clean Nothing OS. Features a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display.

name: Motorola Edge 40 Pro
description: Premium Motorola device with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, 165Hz display, and 125W TurboPower charging. Features a 6.67-inch pOLED display.
